sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When working on an incident, the user can trigger the time worked (start / stop) and can choose a different task if he have more than one avaialble for this task.</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>requested</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Rachel Rowlandson">45ccd59e4f2863007e72aa95d310c767</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="GB3" name="GB3">242324124fa463007e72aa95d310c748</assignment_group> <category display_value="Integration">62c04d3f4fac23007e72aa95d310c77b</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>Each Time card will be assigned to a Harvest task. if the user have more than one task per project, the system will show the tasks to select.</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 03:00:00</estimated_hours> <notes/> <number>TAS0001135</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>Time Cards</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-27 08:59:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f9e71ba94ff867007e72aa95d310c77c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-27 08:59:31</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
